content.description:
Start on the good hold in the middle of the wall under the lowest roof. Move up to a good hold on the next face, then get your feet up, and reach for the seam beneath the final roof. Move left until you can delicately reach the lip from the seam.

Some more hold cleaning (and pads) could yield a cooler line, topping out earlier to the higher part of the lip. It might be a V7?
content.location: A good hold sits a few feet left of the arete at around chest-height. Start here, then head up and left to the lowest part of the lip of the boulder.

content.description:
Climb the obvious, SE arete. At the halfway-point ledge, stay on the arete, and fight against tree branches while mantelling to holds further up. It is highball, committing, and fun as hell!

This would be 4 stars if not for the tree branch.
content.protection: Pads, or a strong mental game.
content.location: On the SE arete of the boulder, continue up the arete without moving right at the halfway-point ledge for full points.
